name: Spiraling Out (You Be Strong)
description:
Follow the story of Uchi the snail as he grows out of his shell trying to  find his place in the world. Spiraling Out is a narrative driven story where the gameplay style changes as our snaily friend changes and explores the theme of sense of belonging in a lighthearted and humoristic way. We hope you enjoy our take on the Global Game Jam 2019 theme: "What home means to you".

PROGRAMMING

Jérémie Tessier (@poik007)

Alex Massé

Philippe Rosa-Pong (@youbestrong)

ARTISTS

Olivier Bolduc

Rachel D'Amours

VOICE ACTING AND NARRATIVE DESIGN

Philippe Rosa-Pong (@youbestrong)
